name: Post-Existence
description:
Story about a man that lost his wife recently and is trying to get his life back on track. He is stuck at home because of the covid situation. He is a level design artist working on a new upcoming game.

He receives a mysterious package one day with a jigsaw puzzle in it, and naturally he starts solving it. After solving it a portal opens and sucks him in. He is transported to a military facility but finds he is alone there with no one but a tablet to help understand what he is doing there.

Made for Senscape Adventurous Jam 2021
